learning_guide_3::text_card_4::text: Raba Marvin ariko arakina cane imbere yuko avuga ubuzima bwiwe  n’inyuma yuko aba umunyezamu w’igori mu mugwi waho nyene.iyo nkuru ivuga umuntu umwe gusa aho atubwira inkuru yiwe.mu ma clip koresha amasanamu yerekana amajambo canke imishamiramo.
learning_guide_3::milestone_card_5::head: Tangura.
learning_guide_3::milestone_card_0::head: Tangura.
learning_guide_3::markdown_card_1::text:
Intangamarara  
Ico cigwa iciyumviro ni « ngira vuge inkuru kurukino rwumupira w’amaguru aho nyene» ukavyerekana uko vyovugwa muburyo butandukanye.ubonye hari akantu kaguhimbaye urashobora kugakora muntumbero yukugira inkuru yawe.tanguza uburya ibibazobizokurikira munyuma.
learning_guide_3::milestone_card_1::text: Shikiriza uko umunsi mukuru uriko uragenda.
learning_guide_3::markdown_card_0::text:
## Intangamarara 
ubu ko mwumvise ibintu shingiro bigize inkuru reka ubu tuvuge ingene bakora inkuru inyura.inkuru zinyura ahanini zishura ikibazo kimwe,ikibazo rusangi.ico kibazo kiguha intumbero utegerezwa gukurikira kandi kikakurongora murico gikorwa cose.
learning_guide_3::milestone_card_6::head: Tangura.
learning_guide_3::milestone_card_3::head: Tangura.
learning_guide_3::intro_card_0::headline: Kuvuga inkuru n’ikibazo rusangi.
learning_guide_3::text_card_0::text: Umviriza uwusigura amasanamu vuga ibiriko biraba mu gihe umugwi wabanyamahanga bahuye kugira bakine urukinorw’umupira w’amaguru aho nyene.iyo nkuru ivuga ikintu kiraho kizwi, ivyabaye n’igituma.namajambo, amajwi y’abantu batandukanyeniyo kenshe akoze inkuru.
learning_guide_3::milestone_card_7::head: Tangura.
learning_guide_3::milestone_card_8::head: Tangura.
learning_guide_3::milestone_card_1::head: Tangura.
learning_guide_3::text_card_2::text: Umviriza umugwi w’abantu bo muri new york bavuga ingene bakunda inkino z’umupira w’amaguru.iyo nkuru iva mubantu bariko baharira ku kibazo gitomoye.inkuru baharira zirakora neza muri audio,ziba zavuye kumajwi y’abantu batandukanye.
learning_guide_3::title: Kuvuga inkuru n’ikibazo rusangi.
learning_guide_3::milestone_card_7::text: Shikiriza uko umunsi mukuru uriko uragenda.
learning_guide_3::milestone_card_2::head: Tangura.
learning_guide_3::text_card_1::text: Umviriza umusiguzi asigure umupira w’amaguru n’abandi bantu basobanure igituma bakunda umupira w’amaguru.inkuru ihagaze ku kibazo « ni igiki umupira w’amaguru »mu majwi umusiguzi atangura kenshi akoresha amajwi y’abantu batandukanye kugira ashikirize ivyiyumviro bitandukanye.
learning_guide_3::text_card_8::text: Raba urukurikirane rw’ibiganiro vy’abakinyi b’umupira w’amaguru aho nyene.iyo nkuru ikozwe n’ibiganiro kubakinyi bifashijwe n’ivyandiko bisobanura umupira w’amaguru.inkuru z’amafoto zikoresha kenshi urukurikirane rw’amasanamu afatanye akoresha abanyagihugu  mukuzuza insiguro zihambaye hamwe n’ivyandiko.
learning_guide_3::preview_card_1::header: Gukina umupira wa soccer kuwa gatandatu.
learning_guide_3::text_card_7::text: Raba ibiriko biraba mu gihe umugwi w’abanyamahanga uhuye kugira bakine umupira w’amaguru aho nyene. Iyo nkuru yibanda ku kintu kimwe hamwe n’ivyabaye.ibiganiro bigizwe n’amafoto vyegeranya amasanamu anezereza canke y’ibikorwa vy’iyo nkuru kenshi mugukoresha ivyandiko biza kuzuza insiguro zibonekeza.
learning_guide_3::milestone_card_4::head: Tangura.
learning_guide_3::text_card_5::text: Raba umugwi w’abanyamahanga bariko bakina umupira w’amaguru baharira kandi k’urukundo bakunda urwo rukino rwonyene.iyo n’inkuru ivuye mu bantu bariko baharira ku kibazo kizwi.impari zo mumasanamu zikoresha ama clips video mu gushigikira inyushu yose y’umwumwe wese.
learning_guide_3::text_card_9::text: Kuraba ibiba kwa Marvin ku munsi umwe nkuko yoba ari umunyezamu w’igori y’umugwi w’umpupira w’amaguru aho nyene.iyo nkuruigizwe n’amasanamu y’umuntu umwe gusa.inkuru zo mu mafoto k’umuntu umwe zirerekana umunezero w’uwo muntu nabo bariko baraganira mu nkuru yiwe.
learning_guide_3::milestone_card_9::head: Tangura.
learning_guide_3::text_card_6::text: Raba ibishika mu gihe umugwi w’abanyamahanga bahuye kugira bakine umupira w’amaguru aho nyene.iyo nkuru ihagaze ku munsi mukuru uzwi, ivyabaye  n’igituma vyabaye.muri video amasanamu akomeye arakenewe kurusha amajwi y’abantu.
learning_guide_3::text_card_3::text: Raba umugwi w’abantu basigura umupira w’amaguru mu gihe umusiguzi ariwe akurikirana inkuru.inkuru igizwe n’ikibazo « n’iki umupira w’amaguru »muri video amasanamu aza gushigikira canke guhakana amajwi y’abantu.
